long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌙 Dark Mode Everywhere 🌙

A simple dark mode extension for effortless nighttime browsing. 🌜

✨ Key Features:
  ⭐️ Website-Specific Dark Mode - toggle dark mode on and off for each website individually.
  ⭐️ Three Modes: On, Auto, Off -  “On” forces dark mode on all websites, “Auto” tries to apply dark mode based on the background color of the website (avoiding dark mode if the site is already dark), and “Off” disables dark mode completely​
  ⭐️ Real-Time Dark Mode Application - the extension dynamically adjusts a site’s appearance without requiring a page reload. 
  ⭐️ Easy-to-Use Popup Interface - simple, intuitive popup interface where users can easily toggle dark mode settings and view the current website's status​
  ⭐️ Resource-friendly design with minimal impact on browsing speed

Completely free and with no ads
